<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In the module inliner, a priority-based worklist is used for calls across</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the entire Module. With this module inliner, the inline order is not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// limited to bottom-up order. More globally scope inline order is enabled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Also, the inline deferral logic become unnecessary in this module inliner.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is possible to use other priority heuristics, e.g. profile-based</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// heuristic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Here is a huge amount duplicate code between the module inliner and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the SCC inliner, which need some refactoring.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbase">CallBase</a> &#42;ICB : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6b0ac1fa4f05de76413c5e0ca6334035">reverse</a>(IFI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/inlinefunctioninfo/#afee77c39305987451e9495b749863d07">InlinedCallSites</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;NewCallee = ICB-&gt;getCalledFunction();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NewCallee) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to promote an indirect (virtual) call without waiting for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the post-inline cleanup and the next DevirtSCCRepeatedPass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// iteration because the next iteration may not happen and we may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// miss inlining it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: enable for ctxprof.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CtxProf)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad3219f7b717320ae52f53ccb09ad5a84">tryPromoteCall</a>(&#42;ICB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">              NewCallee = ICB-&gt;getCalledFunction();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NewCallee)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!NewCallee-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#a32e606ac4c88f71f14212e42b808e7f4">isDeclaration</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Calls-&gt;push(&#123;ICB, NewHistoryID&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For local functions, check whether this makes the callee trivially</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// dead. In that case, we can drop the body of the function eagerly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which may reduce the number of callers of other functions to one,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// changing inline cost thresholds.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> CalleeWasDeleted = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Callee.hasLocalLinkage()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To check this we also need to nuke any dead constant uses (perhaps</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// made dead by this operation on other functions).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Callee.removeDeadConstantUsers();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if (Callee.use&#95;empty() &amp;&amp; !CG.isLibFunction(Callee)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Callee.use&#95;empty() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/lazycallgraph-cpp/#af481ee3f81ad12db32ea0df13ec4b0d0">isKnownLibFunction</a>(Callee, GetTLI(Callee))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Calls-&gt;erase&#95;if(&#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::pair&lt;CallBase &#42;, int&gt; &amp;<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>.first-&gt;getCaller() == &amp;Callee;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clear the body and queue the function itself for deletion when we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// finish inlining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that after this point, it is an error to do anything other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than use the callee&#39;s address or delete it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Callee.dropAllReferences();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd1cd968cb420c82d70926920fcdc7d7">is&#95;contained</a>(DeadFunctions, &amp;Callee) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">               </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cannot put cause a function to become dead twice!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DeadFunctions.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&amp;Callee);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CalleeWasDeleted = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (CalleeWasDeleted)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Advice-&gt;recordInliningWithCalleeDeleted();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Advice-&gt;recordInlining();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now that we&#39;ve finished inlining all of the calls across this module,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// delete all of the trivially dead functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that this walks a pointer set which has non-deterministic order but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that is OK as all we do is delete things and add pointers to unordered</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sets.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;DeadF : DeadFunctions) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Clear out any cached analyses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#a83c7e5ca51099e4efa895791a02fb0ed">FAM</a>.clear(&#42;DeadF, DeadF-&gt;getName());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And delete the actual function from the module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    M.getFunctionList().erase(DeadF);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++NumDeleted;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/#a1258a1ff55557c27684010ebd7283712">PreservedAnalyses::all</a>();</span></CodeLine>
